component.text: Click the steps to view the switch port transition through the states of STP.

Off Disabled:
  • Port shut down or port failed.

Blocking:
  • Steady Amber
  • Receive BPDUs.
  • Discard data frames
  • Does not learn addresses
  • Takes up to 20 seconds to change to listening state

Listening:
  • Blinking Amber
  • Listens for BPDUs
  • Does not forward frames
  • Does not learn MAC addresses
  • Determines if switch has more than one trunking port that might create a loop.
    • -If loop: returns to the blocking state.
    -If no loop: transitions to learning state
  • Takes 15 seconds to transition to learning, also called forward-delay

Learning:
  • Blinking Amber
  • Processes BPDUs
  • Learns MAC addresses from traffic received
  • Does not forward frames
  • Takes 15 seconds to transition to forwarding

Forwarding:
  • Blinking Green
  • Processes BPDUs
  • Learns MAC addresses
  • Forwards frames
This is the start of an animation
An example of a Bubble that expands downward
